title: The Knight's Dilemma
description: You wake up as a knight in the middle of a complex position. Your king is under pressure and you must choose between defending or attacking. The collective wisdom has seen this position before - will you trust their judgment?
background: As a knight, you have unique movement patterns that can create tactical opportunities. The collective wisdom must balance attacking chances with defensive responsibilities.

consequences.choiceA: Aggressive move that may win material but risks king safety
consequences.choiceB: Defensive move that protects the king but may lose initiative

godMove.reasoning: Most players prefer active play in this position
